---
title: Assignment 4 Class Diagram
---
classDiagram
    Server "1"--"0..*" Question: manages
    Server "1"--"0..*" Answer: manages
    Server "1"--"0..*" Tag: manages
    Question "1"--"0..*" Tag: has
    Question "1"--"0..*" Answer: has

    Server : +questions List[Question]
    Server : +answers List[Answer]
    Server : +tags List[Tag]
    Server: +getSearchResultsList()
    Server: +getTags()
    Server: +getTagsWithCount()
    Server: +IncrementQuestionView(qid)
    Server: +postQuestion()
    Server: +postAnswer()
    Server: +getQuestionsByTagName()
    Server: +getQuestionsByTagId()
    Server: +getQuestions(sortType)
    Server: +getHome()
    Server: +getAnswers(qid)

    class Question{
      +String qid
      +String title
      +String text
      +List tagIds
      +String askedBy
      +Date askDate
      +List ansIds
      +Int views
      +Question(qid: String, title: String, text: String, tags: Set[Tag], author: String, askDate: Date)
    }
    class Answer{
        
      -String aid
      -String text
      -String ansBy
      -Date ansDate
      +Answer(aid: String, text: String, author: String, askDate: Date)

    }
    class Tag{
      -String tid
      -String name
      Tag(tid, String, name: String)
    }
